item.title: LaTeX IPA
item.description: I made this repository to simplify the process of using IPA in $\LaTeX$. It is merely a collection of snippets for the package TIPA. To install LaTeX-IPA see the package control page. File naming Consonants are labeled in the following way: voicing -> point of articulation -> mode of articulation Ex. voiceless-bilabial-aprox.sublime-snippet = [β] Vowels are labeled in the following way: vowel -> tense/lax -> height -> frontedness -> rounding
